organization_registration_agency.name: organization_registration_agency
organization_registration_agency.label: organisation-registration-agency
organization_registration_agency.hover_text: Select the agency in your country where your organisation is registered. If you do not know this information please email PubToolTest@iatistandard.org

registration_number.name: registration_number
registration_number.label: registration-number
registration_number.hover_text: Provide the registration number for your organisation that has been provided by organisation registration agency. If you do not know this please email PubToolTest@iatistandard.org.

iati-activity-identifier.name: organisation_identifier
iati-activity-identifier.label: organisation-identifier
iati-activity-identifier.hover_text: The Organisation Identifier is a unique code for your organisation. This is generated from the Organisation Registration Agency and Registration Number. For more information read: How to create your IATI organisation identifier. For more information

name.label: name
name.hover_text: The human-readable name of the organisation. This element must occur once and only once (within each parent element). For more information

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: The free text name or description of the item being described. This can be repeated in multiple languages. For more information

lang.name: language
lang.label: @xml:lang
lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

reporting_org.name: reporting_org
reporting_org.label: reporting-org
reporting_org.hover_text: The organisation issuing the report. May be a primary source (reporting on its own activity as donor, implementing agency, etc) or a secondary source (reporting on the activities of another organisation). For more information

ref.name: ref
ref.label: @ref
ref.hover_text: Machine-readable identification string for the organisation issuing the report. Must be in the format {RegistrationAgency}-{RegistrationNumber}. For more information

type.name: type
type.label: @type
type.hover_text: The type of organisation issuing the report. For more information

secondary_reporter.name: secondary_reporter
secondary_reporter.label: @secondary-reporter
secondary_reporter.hover_text: A flag indicating that the reporting organisation of this activity is acting as a secondary reporter. A secondary reporter is one that reproduces data on the activities of an organisation for which it is not directly responsible. For more information

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: The free text name or description of the item being described. This can be repeated in multiple languages. For more information

lang.name: language
lang.label: @xml:lang
lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

total_budget.name: total_budget
total_budget.label: total-budget
total_budget.hover_text: The total-budget element allows for the reporting of the organisation’s own budget. The recommendation is that, where and when possible, the organisation’s total annual planned budget for each of the next three years is reported. For more information

status.name: total_budget_status
status.label: @status
status.hover_text: The status explains whether the budget being reported is indicative or has been formally committed. The value should appear within the BudgetStatus codelist. For more information

period_start.name: period_start
period_start.label: period-start
period_start.hover_text: The start of the budget period. For more information

date.name: date
date.label: @iso-date
date.hover_text: This attribute is required. For more information

period_end.name: period_end
period_end.label: period-end
period_end.hover_text: The end of the period (which must not be greater than one year). For more information

date.name: date
date.label: @iso-date
date.hover_text: This attribute is required. For more information

value.name: value
value.label: value
value.hover_text: The total value of the organisation’s aid budget for this period. For more information

currency.name: currency
currency.label: @currency
currency.hover_text: A three letter ISO 4217 code for the original currency of the amount. This is required for all currency amounts unless the iati-organisation/@default-currency attribute is specified. For more information

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: @value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date to be used for determining the exchange rate for currency conversions. This attribute is required. For more information

budget_line.name: budget_line
budget_line.label: budget-line
budget_line.hover_text: A breakdown of the total budget into sub-totals. The breakdown is determined by the reporting organisation and described in the narrative. For more information

ref.name: ref
ref.label: @ref
ref.hover_text: An internal reference for this budget line taken from the reporting organisation’s own system. For more information

currency.name: currency
currency.label: @currency
currency.hover_text: The budget sub-total. The definition of the sub-division is determined by iati-organisation/total-budget/budget-line/narrative For more information

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: @value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date to be used for determining the exchange rate for currency conversions.For more information

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: The free text name or description of the item being described. This can be repeated in multiple languages. For more information

lang.name: language
lang.label: @xml:lang
lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

recipient_org_budget.name: recipient_org_budget
recipient_org_budget.label: recipient-org-budget
recipient_org_budget.hover_text: The recipient-org-budget element allows for the reporting of forward looking budgets for each institution which receives core funding from the reporting organisation. For more information

status.name: status
status.label: @status
status.hover_text: The status explains whether the budget being reported is indicative or has been formally committed. The value should appear within the BudgetStatus codelist. For more information

recipient_org.name: recipient_org
recipient_org.label: recipient-org
recipient_org.hover_text: The organisation that will receive the funds. For more information

ref.name: ref
ref.label: @ref
ref.hover_text: Machine-readable identification string for the organisation issuing the report. Must be in the format {RegistrationAgency}-{RegistrationNumber} For more information

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: The name of the organisation. This can be repeated in multiple languages. For more information

lang.name: language
lang.label: @xml:lang
lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

period_start.name: period_start
period_start.label: period-start
period_start.hover_text: This element must occur once and only once (within each parent element). For more information

date.name: date
date.label: @iso-date
date.hover_text: This attribute is required. This value must be of type xsd:date. For more information

period_end.name: period_end
period_end.label: period-end
period_end.hover_text: The end of the period (which must not be greater than one year). For more information

date.name: date
date.label: @iso-date
date.hover_text: This attribute is required. This value must be of type xsd:date. For more information

value.name: value
value.label: value
value.hover_text: The total value of the money budgeted to be disbursed to the specified recipient organisation during this time period. For more information

currency.name: currency
currency.label: @currency
currency.hover_text: A three letter ISO 4217 code for the original currency of the amount. This is required for all currency amounts unless the iati-organisation/@default-currency attribute is specified. For more information

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: @value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date to be used for determining the exchange rate for currency conversions. This attribute is required. For more information

budget_line.label: budget-line
budget_line.hover_text: A breakdown of the total budget into sub-totals. The breakdown is determined by the reporting organisation and described in the narrative. For more information

value_date.hover_text: The date to be used for determining the exchange rate for currency conversions.For more information

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: The free text name or description of the item being described. This can be repeated in multiple languages. For more information

lang.name: language
lang.label: @xml:lang
lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

recipient_region_budget.name: recipient_region_budget
recipient_region_budget.label: recipient-region-budget
recipient_region_budget.hover_text: The recipient-region-budget element allows for the reporting of forward looking budgets where the organisation maintains region-wide, rather than or in addition to country-specific budgets. For more information

status.name: status
status.label: @status
status.hover_text: The status explains whether the budget being reported is indicative or has been formally committed. The value should appear within the BudgetStatus codelist. For more information

recipient_region.name: recipient_region
recipient_region.label: Recipient Region
recipient_region.hover_text: The supranational geographic region where funds have been allocated. For more information

vocabulary.name: region_vocabulary
vocabulary.label: @vocabulary
vocabulary.hover_text: An IATI code for the vocabulary from which the region code is drawn. If it is not present, code 1 (‘OECD DAC’) is assumed. For more information

oecd_region_code.name: region_code
oecd_region_code.label: @code
oecd_region_code.hover_text: Either an OECD DAC or UN region code. Codelist is determined by vocabulary attribute. For more information

region_code.name: code
region_code.label: @code
region_code.hover_text: Either an OECD DAC or UN region code. Codelist is determined by vocabulary attribute. For more information

vocabulary-uri.name: vocabulary_uri
vocabulary-uri.label: @vocabulary-uri
vocabulary-uri.hover_text: The URI where this vocabulary is defined. If the vocabulary is 99 (reporting organisation), the URI where this internal vocabulary is defined. For more information

narrative.hover_text: The free text name or description of the item being described. This can be repeated in multiple languages. For more information

recipient_country_budget.hover_text: The recipient-country-budget element allows for the reporting of forward looking budgets for each country in which the organisation operates. For more information

document_link.name: document_link
document_link.label: Document Link
document_link.hover_text: A link to an online, publicly accessible web page or document. For more information

url.name: url
url.label: @url
url.hover_text: The target URL of the external document, e.g. 'http://www.example.org/doc.odt'.For more information

format.name: format
format.label: @format
format.hover_text: An IANA code for the MIME type of the document being referenced, e.g. “application/pdf”. For more information

lang.name: language

description.name: description
